channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- ArcGIS GeoEvent Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- ArcGIS GeoEvent Server

item.title: CVE-2021-29101|2024-09-16T21:08:13.528Z -- esri -- arcgis%20geoevent%20server
item.description: ArcGIS GeoEvent Server versions 10.8.1 and below has a read-only directory path traversal vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to perform directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files on the system.
